name: Pale Faced Lightning
description:
Click to send lightning to dissuade invaders from stealing your pumpkins!

Built in 72 hours for Mini Jam 89: Pumpkins.  Based off the legend of the Pale Faced Lightning, from Native Americans who lived in Arizona.  

Made in Unity.  Art was made in Aseprite and Pixel FX Designer.  Music was created in FamiStudio, and sound effects were made in ChipTone.  Font used is Thaleah Fat, by Tiny Worlds.

I'd love to add more, and may revisit this myth-inspired fun in the future!

Enjoy!
